name: The Morrigan
description: Step into this world of beautiful stylised graphics and explore striking, handcrafted environments - torch in one hand, big axe in the other. Built exclusively for VR.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080/AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
